alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 3:21AM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi and West Tennessee. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Partial to complete ice melting is expected Tuesday afternoon before additional freezing arrives Tuesday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
